TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderHwndOverride implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公开一个方法，该方法可用于对片段的 UI 自动化树内的基于窗口的元素进行重定位。

span.span: Exposes a method that enables repositioning of window-based elements within the UI Automation tree of the fragment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple GetOverrideProviderForHwnd(native int hwnd) cil managed
Public Function GetOverrideProviderForHwnd (hwnd As IntPtr) As IRawElementProviderSimple

span.span: The window handle of the element.

summary.span: 检索指定元素的 UI 自动化提供程序。

span.span: Retrieves a UI automation provider for the specified element.

returns.span: 指定元素的提供程序；如果未重写该元素的默认提供程序，则为一个 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 ）。

span.span: The provider for the specified element, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the element's default provider is not being overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由客户端时这些子元素中的将 Hwnd 不会在中以逻辑方式放置包含基于窗口的子元素的片段中的片段根的 UI 自动化提供程序实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。This method is implemented by client-side UI Automation providers for fragment roots in fragments that contain window-based child elements, when the HWNDs of those child elements are not logically positioned within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 有关详细信息，请参阅非 WPF 提供程序重新设置父级和非 WPF 提供程序中重新定位[服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/server-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md)主题。For more information, see Non-WPF Provider Reparenting and Non-WPF Provider Repositioning in the [Server-Side UI Automation Provider Implementation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/server-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md) topic. 返回提供程序必须是片段树的一部分。The returned provider must be part of the fragment tree. 它可以提供其他属性，或重写指定组件的属性。It can supply additional properties or override properties of the specified component. 如果返回的提供程序实现，提供程序应可以片段的树的一部分，并且可通过导航从片段的根。If the returned provider implements , the provider should be part of the fragment's tree and be reachable by navigating from the fragment's root.
